attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.

attributes.description:
Demo Model , Low Mileage , Good as New , Nation wide Delivery , 
5 Year / 150 000km Warranty
peace-of-mind comes standard
The Renault Warranty comes standard with every new vehicle, covering the
costs of repair of any unexpected electronic or mechanical malfunctions,
for a period of up to 5 years or 150 000km, whichever comes first.
24 hour roadside assistance
Whatever the emergency, we’ll always be there.
Because your personal safety is of utmost importance to us, help is one phone call away.
Simply dial 0861 114 352 for assistance or for a team to be dispatched to you.
Our 24 hour Roadside Assistance Plan covers all new Renault vehicles for a period of
5 years or 150 000km with an option for extension.

attributes.description: PORT ELIZABETH A 6speed CVT gearbox with Sports Mode coupled to Mitsubishis 2.0litre MIVEC petrol engine. The latest model offers cuttingedge technology to deliver a bold action adventure compact SUV that takes you beyond the everyday. The stimulating design concept of the allnew Eclipse Cross brings the new compact SUV into the modern age, combining the latest styling design with incredible driving dynamics and innovative, intuitive safety technology. The allnew models vibrant styling expresses a fresh sportiness and stylishness, making a bold statement on the road. Like the ring of sunlight from behind the moon in a full eclipse, the sharply sculpted character line makes the Eclipse Cross appear as if the body was carved from a single block of metal. On the inside the Eclipse Cross offers complete style and comfort with bolstered seats giving the driver relaxed support and unchallenged visibility. (OTR costs are excluded R5500)

attributes.description: Excellent Condition Abarth 124 Turismo, One Owner from new with full service history, spare key and Balance of Factory service plan and warranty.  BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
